snippet: A website that popularized the episode recap is shutting down, but TV obsessives will be relieved to know that its archives will live on.
abstract: Juliet Lapidos Editorial Notebook reflects on the announcement that Web site Television Without Pity has ceased its operations and shuttered its reader forums; notes that news of TWoP's demise unleashed a torrent of nostalgia and praise from fans and professional writers.
lead_paragraph: A website that popularized the episode recap is shutting down, but TV obsessives will be relieved to know that its archives will live on.
